scripts.copy-goerli-address: ADDR=$(cat deployments/goerli_5/SonOfASwap.json | jq .address) && echo "{\"address\": $ADDR}" > contract.json && cat contract.json && cp contract.json ../frontend/src/
scripts.deploy-goerli: npx hardhat run --network goerli scripts/deploy.js && yarn copy-goerli-abi && yarn copy-goerli-address
scripts.copy-local-abi: ABI=$(cat $(ls -t deployments/local* | head -n 1 | cut -d':' -f 1)/SonOfASwap.json | jq .abi) && echo $ABI > ../backend/src/abi/sonOfASwap.json && echo $ABI > ../frontend/src/abi/sonOfASwap.json
scripts.copy-local-address: ADDR=$(cat $(ls -t deployments/local* | head -n 1 | cut -d':' -f 1)/SonOfASwap.json | jq .address) && echo "{\"address\": $ADDR}" > contract.json && cat contract.json && cp contract.json ../frontend/src/
scripts.deploy-local: npx hardhat run --network local scripts/deploy.js && yarn copy-local-abi && yarn copy-local-address
scripts.fake-deploy: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js && yarn copy-abi
